content: bulky scrappy sweater __________________________________________________________________________________________________ marny kindness designs supermarno on ravelry and instagram bulky scrappy sweater is a perfect project for using up all your scrap yarns from other projects holding the yarn together by mixing colors creates interesting color combos using all fingering weight yarn this sweater is super squishy and cozy perfect accessory for sweater weather seasons and adding style to your fall and winter wardrobe pattern information knit flat for body and circular for sleeves pattern is for one size can be adjusted as needed for length and width because there were so many scraps of yarn yardage was hard to determine this one is knit for a 48 /122cm bust 1 yarn & supplies techniques fingering weight yarn held 5 strands at a time long tail cast on perfect for using up advent skeins mini skeins knit extra fingering weight yarn from projects purl decreases needles abbreviations size us 15/ 10mm and us 17/ 12mm in 40 / 101cm k - knit p - purl circular can use magic loop for sleeves or double sts - stitches pointed needles or size needed to obtain gauge k2tog - knit 2 together 1 stitch decreased ssk - slip slip knit 1 stitch decreased gauge notions 8 stitches and 9 row in stockinette stitch = 4 /10cm stitch marker on size us 17/ 12mm needle or size needed to obtain scissors gauge please take the time to check the gauge tapestry needle to weave in ends pattern instructions rib with a smaller needle cast on 88 sts long tail cast on or preferred method *p2 k2* rib for 2 5 / 6 35cm about 9 row switch to larger needles body with larger needles stockinette stitch until the piece measures 15 / 38cm from cast on edge you can extend this longer if preferred separate for front and back put 22 sts on a holder knit 44 sts put 22 sts on a holder you will now be knitting the back sts 44 sts stockinette stitch until the piece measures 25 / 63 5cm from cast on edge about 9 / 23cm from armhole knit 14 bind off 16 knit 14 you will now be working on each side of the shoulder separately purl 1 row knit 1 row purl 1 row bind off attach yarn to the other shoulder purl 1 row knit 1 row purl 1 row bind off front right pick up stitches for the front right knit for 4 / 10cm begin decreases on the right side of the neck row 1 - k1 ssk knit to end 1 st decreased row 2 - purl repeat these 2 row until 14 sts left stockinette stitch until the front measures the same as the back bind off all stitches 2024 copyright pattern and images - marny kindness 2 front left pick up stitches from front left knit for 4 / 10cm begin decreases on the left side of the neck row 1 - knit to 3 sts
